mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kingston, April 15, 1809. : Dear Sir, The Federal Committee of the County of Ulster cannot refrain, on the eve of an important election, again to address you on the necessity of union, energy and exertion, at the ensuing contest. ... : To the polls then-- At the day of election hasten to the polls-- and support, and vote for the American Ticket.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Elmendorf, Cd. Edm.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Federal Committee of the County of Ulster
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Foote, Ebenezer, 1756-1829
